infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Geschenk needs access to your photo library to let you select images for your Secret Santa groups and profile picture. For example, you can choose a photo from your library to set as a group image when creating a new Secret Santa group.

plugins.photosPermission: Geschenk needs access to your photo library to let you select images for your Secret Santa groups and profile picture. For example, you can choose a photo from your library to set as a group image when creating a new Secret Santa group.

Geschenk needs access to your photo library to let you select images for your Secret Santa groups and profile picture. For example, you can choose a photo from your library to set as a group image when creating a new Secret Santa group.
